name: The Best of Us - Better Together
name_original: The Best of Us - Better Together
description: The Best of Us – Better Together® is a multiplayer collaborative competition for treasure hunting in a science fiction environment. Three teams compete to find treasures and bring them back to the portal from where they arrived. The team that passes through the portal with the majority of the treasures wins. The playground is composed of different landscapes forming small (4 sqkm) or big (36 sqkm) playgrounds and the treasure hunt has 9 different levels of difficulty. Participants cannot kill or eliminate each other. They canonly compete to get to the treasure and try to steal it from each other.
